title: Watch TURNSTILE's Full Primavera Sound Porto 2025 Set
description: Turnstile Summer! The post Watch TURNSTILE's Full Primavera Sound Porto 2025 Set appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 6 hours ago
text: Turnstile has been turning heads over the last few weeks. From the insane free gig they held in their hometown, to performing on The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon, to the critical acclaim their newest record, Never Enough, all eyes are on Turnstile. So, it should come as no surprise that some pretty good quality fan footage landed on YouTube of the band's set at Primavera Sound Porto in Portugal. Turnstile are currently hitting UK and European festivals before they return back to the US in the fall. You can check out their US tour dates below. And, you can watch Turnstile's full Primavera Sound Porto set above. September 15th – Nashville, TN @ The Pinnacle (w/ SPEED, Jane Remover)September 17th – Asheville, NC @ Asheville Yards Amphitheater (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)September 19th – Philadelphia, PA @ Skyline Stage at Mann (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)September 20th – Boston, MA @ The Stage at Suffolk Downs (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)September 21st – Buffalo, NY @ The Outer Harbor at Terminal B (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)September 23rd – Columbus, OH @ KEMBA Live! html:
Turnstile has been turning heads over the last few weeks. From the insane free gig they held in their hometown, to performing on The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon, to the critical acclaim their newest record, Never Enough, all eyes are on Turnstile.

So, it should come as no surprise that some pretty good quality fan footage landed on YouTube of the band's set at Primavera Sound Porto in Portugal. Turnstile are currently hitting UK and European festivals before they return back to the US in the fall. You can check out their US tour dates below.

And, you can watch Turnstile's full Primavera Sound Porto set above.

September 15th – Nashville, TN @ The Pinnacle (w/ SPEED, Jane Remover)
September 17th – Asheville, NC @ Asheville Yards Amphitheater (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 19th – Philadelphia, PA @ Skyline Stage at Mann (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 20th – Boston, MA @ The Stage at Suffolk Downs (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 21st – Buffalo, NY @ The Outer Harbor at Terminal B (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 23rd – Columbus, OH @ KEMBA Live! (w/ Blood Orange, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 24th – Richmond, VA @ Brown's Island (w/ Blood Orange, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 26th – Chicago, IL @ Huntington Bank Pavilion at Northerly Island (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 27th – Minneapolis, MN @ The Armory (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 28th – Des Moines, IA @ Lauridsen Amphitheater at Waterworks Park (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
September 30th – Denver, CO @ Project 70 Under the Bridge (w/ Mannequin Pussy, SPEED & Jane Remover)
October 3rd – Sacramento, CA @ Aftershock Festival

October 5th – San Francisco, CA @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium (w/ Amyl & The Sniffers, SPEED & Jane Remover)
October 7th – Seattle, WA @ WaMu Theater (w/ Amyl & The Sniffers, SPEED & Jane Remover)
October 8th – Portland, OR @ Edgefield Concerts on the Lawn (w/ Amyl & The Sniffers, SPEED & Jane Remover)
October 10th – San Diego, CA @ Gallagher Square at Petco Park (w/ Amyl & The Sniffers, SPEED & Jane Remover)
October 11th – Phoenix, AZ @ Mesa Amphitheater (w/ Amyl & The Sniffers, SPEED & Jane Remover)
October 14th – Austin, TX @ Moody Amphitheater (w/ Amyl & The Sniffers, SPEED & Jane Remover)
